ï»¿ DOCUMENTS). RECOMMENDATION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEE
TO: The President, International Development Association
Recommendation of the Committee under Section 1(d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Grant (Additional Financing For Higher Education Quality Improvement Project) to the Republic of Yemen
The undersigned Committee constituted under Section 1(d) of Article V of the Articles of
Agreement of International Development Association (the Association) hereby submits its
recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal that the Association grants to
the Republic of Yemen (the Recipient) an additional grant in an amount equivalent to
SDR 2,000,000. The purpose of said grant is to create the enabling conditions for the
enhancement of the quality of university programs and graduate employability.
I. The Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to provide such additional
grant, and of the purposes to which the proceeds of the additional grant are to be applied.
2. The Committee is of the opinion that the project toward the financing of which the
proceeds of such additional grant are to be applied comes within the purposes of the Association as
set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said project is designed to promote the
economic development of the Republic of Yemen and is of high developmental priority in the light
of the needs of the Republic of Yemen.  -2-
REPUBLIC OF YEMEN (Additional Financing for Higher Education Quality Improvement Project)
3. Accordingly, the Committee finds that said project merits financial assistance from the
Association and hereby recommends said project for such additional assistance.
COMMITTEE
Senior Vice Presidt and Group General Counsel
Nominee selected by Governor for the Republic of Yemen
Regional Vice President Middle East and North Africa
Dated at Washington, D.C.
